summary: An Ottolexius & Rhaegar01 work. Legend Of Zelda - Master Sword
descriptionHtml:
Hello guys, this mod will add to your game a new sword. This sword from Legend Of Zelda, its name is Master Sword. 

You can forge it under \"steel category\", you can upgrade it. Enjoy!

Waiting for your Screens!
Ottolexius & Rhaegar01

[center][img]http://www.hizliresimyukle.com/images/2013/10/10/lMiUx.png[/img]
[img]http://www.hizliresimyukle.com/images/2013/10/10/Rl54D.png[/img]
[img]http://www.hizliresimyukle.com/images/2013/10/10/C2xM7.png[/img][/center]

[youtube]http://youtu.be/dEyb2UUodGc[/youtube]
author: Rhaegar01 - Ottolexius
